about_the_game:
Expand the Mystic Destinies experience with additional content!

  • Get the digital artbook with new facts about the characters!
  • Listen to the highly anticipated original soundtrack!
  • Go deeper into Mystic Destinies lore with the God of Chaos story.
  • See what he was thinking during a pivotal scene in His POV short stories.
detailed_description:
Expand the Mystic Destinies experience with additional content!

  • Get the digital artbook with new facts about the characters!
  • Listen to the highly anticipated original soundtrack!
  • Go deeper into Mystic Destinies lore with the God of Chaos story.
  • See what he was thinking during a pivotal scene in His POV short stories.
legal_notice:
• Gameplay videos need to have prior permission to be uploaded outside of Steam. Doing so without permission means your video might be at risk to be taken down. Email us at support@aeondreamstudios.com to request prior permission.
  • Screenshots are welcomed and encouraged, but please avoid showing any major plot moments.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (onboard sufficient)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
